--- title: "2.8 — Trade Agreements — Class Content" execute: freeze: auto --- ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.callout-note appearance="minimal"} # Meeting Date *Tuesday, April 18, 2023* ::: ## Overview ### Readings ### Optional Readings # Optional Readings - [ *Freakonomics*, 2018, Ep. 352: "Can This Man Stop a Trade War?"](https://freakonomics.com/podcast/wto/) - [ *NPR Planet Money*, 2015, Ep. 635: "Trade Deal Confidential"](https://www.npr.org/sections/money/2015/06/26/417851577/episode-635-trade-deal-confidential) ## Slides Below, you can find the slides in two formats. Clicking the image will bring you to the html version of the slides in a new tab. The lower button will allow you to download a PDF version of the slides. ::: callout-tip You can type h to see a special list of viewing options, and type o for an outline view of all the slides. ::: I suggest printing the slides beforehand and using them to take additional notes in class (*not everything* is in the slides)!
